General.Name: Axteria Group Bhd
General.Description: Axteria Group Berhad engages in the property development and investment activities in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development and Construction, and trading segments. It develops and manages properties; secures and carries out construction contracts; engages in wholesale trading of construction material; and operates hotels. Its portfolio includes commercial properties, hotels, shops, SPA, offices and co-working spaces, and retail showroom space. The company was formerly known as Acoustech Berhad and changed its name to Axteria Group Berhad in July 2021. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
